title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view and deleting it from the outline image, then renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg' and importing it again, the original image is still displayed.
EB: After importing a new 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the expected result is that the new image is displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Import the renamed 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
